comments.body:
Not sure if we should add a test to make sure the header files are included properly. Something like:

```
test:
    imports:
        - cppy
    commands:
        - test -f ${SP_DIR}/cppy/include/cppy/cppy.h
```

This might not work on the windows build, but if this is `noarch: python` it will only get built on linux once it hits the feedstock, I believe.
